statements: SELECT * FROM warehouse_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature FROM warehouse_sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, humidity FROM warehouse_sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20;
SELECT sensor_id, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_sensor_data ORDER BY humidity DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature, humidity, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature, humidity, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, storage_condition DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM warehouse_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM warehouse_sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_name, humidity, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensors ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensors WHERE storage_condition = 'Dry';
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensors WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM warehouse_sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT sensor_name, storage_condition FROM warehouse_sensors WHERE storage_condition IN ('Dry', 'Cool');
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM warehouse_sensors WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, storage_condition, COUNT(*) AS Total_Records FROM warehouse_sensors GROUP BY storage_condition HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_temperature;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM warehouse_humidity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM warehouse_storage_conditions WHERE air_quality = 'Good';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_temperature WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM warehouse_humidity;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_temperature WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM warehouse_humidity WHERE humidity < 50.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity, air_quality FROM warehouse_storage_conditions WHERE air_quality = 'good' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM warehouse_temperature;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM warehouse_storage_conditions GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature FROM warehouse WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT * FROM warehouse ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) FROM warehouse GROUP BY sensor_type
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity), MIN(temperature) FROM warehouse
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature FROM warehouse WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(DISTINCT(sensor_type)) AS sensor_types_count FROM warehouse GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT(sensor_type)) > 1
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM warehouse WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS readings_count FROM warehouse WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-01' GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY readings_count DESC
SELECT * FROM warehouse_temperature ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM warehouse_humidity WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT id, temperature FROM storage_conditions WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_temperature ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, sensor_id, temperature FROM warehouse_humidity WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM storage_conditions GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20;
SELECT sensors.location, sensor_readings.temperature, sensor_readings.humidity FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensors.sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM warehouse_temperature GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY max_temperature DESC, max_humidity DESC;
